html:
conspiracy. The conspiracy may refer to the enemies of Judah who had hoped to install a puppet ruler (the son of Tabeal) on the throne of Ahaz (7:6).

neither fear ye their fear. This refers to the fear of the damned, who carry the burden of their sins and who succumb to the world's unrighteous and unproductive influence. The righteous reverence and fear the Lord and thus find peace.
